title: Add tests for audio extraction from .apkg files
description:
Create unit and integration tests for audio extraction functionality:
- Test media mapping parsing
- Test audio file extraction with correct filenames
- Test audio reference extraction from card HTML
- Test handling of Chinese character filenames
- Integration test with A_Course_in_Contemporary_Chinese_1.apkg (540 files)

title: Implement audio extraction from .apkg files
description: Extend AnkiReader to extract and map audio files from Anki packages. Phase 1: basic extraction with no additional dependencies.
close_reason: Implemented Phase 1 audio extraction: get_media_mapping(), extract_audio_files(), get_audio_for_card(), get_audio_statistics(). Tested with 538 MP3 files. Uses only stdlib, no dependencies.
